StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllCi.es]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: AS BEGIN -- Ci.es in US SELECT c.[Code], c.[Name], c.[StateCode], c.[StateName], c.[CountyCode], c.[CountyName] FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[vwCi.es] c INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[vwStatesWithTerritories] s ON c.StateCode = s.Code UNION -- Ci.es from Other Countries SELECT [Code], [Name], [StateCode], [StateName], [CountyCode], [CountyName] FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[vwCi.es] WHERE StateCode IN (SELECT Code AS CountryCode FROM [USMC].[vwCountries] WHERE Code <> 'US' AND ISNUMERIC(LEFT(Code, 1)) = 0) AND Name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY StateCode, CountyCode, [Name] END
